title: Semantic Caching with ElasticSearch and Milvus
author: Partha Pratim Neog, Vishwajith C R, Preeti Sajjan, Gautam Chutani
description: This repository contains a generic Python class designed to quickly integrate Semantic Caching into your applications and enable plug-and-play usage. The class abstracts the underlying implementation, allowing you to seamlessly switch between WatsonX Discovery (Elasticsearch) and Milvus for your caching needs.
